entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 12:42PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels Along The Coast This Weekend... A strong weather front will move through the Bering Sea this weekend and will bring gale force southerly winds and elevated water levels to coastal areas. entry.cap:areaDesc: Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:29AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot This Weekend for the North Slope and Arctic Coast... A dry and hot chinook wind will develop across the Brooks Range late Friday into Sunday. Warmth may linger into Monday with high temps across the arctic plain into the 80s F and upper 70s along the arctic coast, Saturday and Sunday.

entry.summary: ...Hot Over Eastern Northern Alaska Friday through Monday...
